name: Segments.ai
headline: Build better computer vision models by building better datasets
description:
[Segments.ai](http://segments.ai/)¬†is helping robotics and automotive companies label their multi-sensor data for AI training and validation. Our platform enables customers to efficiently annotate their point cloud and image data, accelerating their path to autonomy.

We're a fast-growing, remote-first YC startup with a lean team and healthy runway. [Segments.ai](http://segments.ai/) is used by large organizations as well as innovative startups building the next generation of autonomous drones, delivery robots, self-driving cars, and more.

founders.name: Otto Debals, Founder
founders.description: Studied mathematical & electrical engineering, and obtained a PhD in signal separation / multilinear algebra. During my PhD, launched Investimize (a financial robo-advisor) together with my current cofounder Bert and also pursued CFA level I. Spent 2 years afterwards as Associate at McKinsey & Company - supporting >15 projects across different functions, industries and regions. Launched Segments.ai in Jan 2020. Passionate about whisky, F1 and long-distance running!

founders.name: Bert De Brabandere, Founder
founders.description: Founder at Segments.ai, PhD from KU Leuven, Computer Vision and Machine Learning. All the way from Belgium.

## Get 3D and image data labeled together
Segments.ai‚Äôs labeling platform lets you label across multiple sensors at the same time ‚Äî so you can improve the quality of all data across the board.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%27114%27%20height%3D%27113%27%20viewBox%3D%270%200%20114%20113%27%3E%3Crect%20width%3D%27114%27%20height%3D%27113%27%20fill-opacity%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E)
### [Get consistent track IDs across modalities and time](https://segments.ai/<https:/segments.ai/data-labeling/multi-sensor#accurate>)
Streamline data labeling, cut down on reconciliation time, and optimize your model training with synced tracking IDs.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%27114%27%20height%3D%27113%27%20viewBox%3D%270%200%20114%20113%27%3E%3Crect%20width%3D%27114%27%20height%3D%27113%27%20fill-opacity%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E)
### [Label multiple sensors with just 1 click](https://segments.ai/<https:/segments.ai/data-labeling/multi-sensor#project>)
Project and copy labels from 3D sensors to 2D sensors with advanced automation. You‚Äôll get a faster and more consistent labeling workflow.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%27114%27%20height%3D%27113%27%20viewBox%3D%270%200%20114%20113%27%3E%3Crect%20width%3D%27114%27%20height%3D%27113%27%20fill-opacity%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E)
### [Fuse information from multiple sensors](https://segments.ai/<https:/segments.ai/data-labeling/multi-sensor#visualize>)
Simultaneously view 2D image and 3D point cloud data to give labelers more context. You‚Äôll get better quality data and cut out the noise.
[Simplify labeling with multi-sensor labeling](https://segments.ai/<https:/segments.ai/data-labeling/multi-sensor/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%2732%27%20height%3D%2724%27%20viewBox%3D%270%200%2032%2024%27%3E%3Crect%20width%3D%2732%27%20height%3D%2724%27%20fill-opacity%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E)
Segments.ai had all the features required for us to label our images and point clouds, such as overlaying 3D point clouds onto 2D images. This proved very useful at giving labelers context for what they were looking at in 3D, especially in noisy shots.
![](https://segments.ai/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Sarina-Hao-Robotics-Engineer.webp)
Sarina H.
Robotics Software Engineer OCIUS Technology Limited
![](https://segments.ai/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/ocius-robotics-testimonial.jpeg)
## Label 3D point clouds efficiently
Annotate objects in 3D in just a few clicks. You can upload point clouds of unlimited size, then label them with smart interfaces and tools such as the merged 3D mode, the batch mode, and automated tracking.
The best part? You can use that 3D data to enrich your 2D labeling efforts. Instead of drawing hundreds of bounding boxes, all you need is a single cuboid in a 3D point cloud. Then, you can project that cuboid to all the images where the object appears and voil√† ‚Äî you‚Äôve just saved your team precious time and effort.
  * ### [Quickly label moving objects](https://segments.ai/<#tab-9a6003f59797d5ae7ce>)
  * ### [Effortlessly label stationary objects](https://segments.ai/<#tab-70999b73f56f0ecedd4>)


  * ### [Quickly label moving objects](https://segments.ai/<#tab-9a6003f59797d5ae7ce>)


Skip the back and forth between frames while making minor cuboid adjustments. Segments.ai lets you see all instances of an object through a sequence in a user-friendly, scrollable view. When you adjust a cuboid in one instance, it‚Äôll update its position, dimensions, and rotations across frames. 
If you want to take it a step further, you can use machine learning for auto-annotations of moving objects. You‚Äôll speed up the process, but still retain complete manual oversight.
  * Real-time interpolation
  * ML-powered object tracking
  * Simple object overview to find inaccuracies quickly


[See all smart point cloud tools](https://segments.ai/<https:/segments.ai/data-labeling/3d-point-cloud/>)
![](https://segments.ai/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/top-only-browser-image-min.png)
Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos.
![ML-assisted data labeling with batch mode smart cuboid propagation](https://segments.ai/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/ML-assisted-data-labeling-with-batch-mode-smart-cuboid-propagation.png)
  * ### [Effortlessly label stationary objects](https://segments.ai/<#tab-70999b73f56f0ecedd4>)


Need to label static objects with only a few points in each frame, but struggling to see the actual dimensions? 
Segments.ai lets you unify all the frames in a sequence into a single merged point cloud. Outlines will be more visible, so the object can be annotated with a tight-fitting cuboid on the first attempt.
  * Enrich an object of only a few points with a single click
  * Get crystal clear object outlines
  * Label cuboids accurately on the first try


[Start labeling more accurately](https://segments.ai/<https:/segments.ai/data-labeling/3d-point-cloud/>)
![](https://segments.ai/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/top-only-browser-image-min.png)
![Data labeling in a point cloud with merged point cloud - before](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271200%27%20height%3D%27630%27%20viewBox%3D%270%200%201200%20630%27%3E%3Crect%20width%3D%271200%27%20height%3D%27630%27%20fill-opacity%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E)![Data labeling in a 3d point cloud with merged point cloud enabled](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271200%27%20height%3D%27630%27%20viewBox%3D%270%200%201200%20630%27%3E%3Crect%20width%3D%271200%27%20height%3D%27630%27%20fill-opacity%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E)
[All features of point cloud labeling](https://segments.ai/<https:/segments.ai/data-labeling/3d-point-cloud/>)
## Get from PoC to production, faster
Accurate labels. Faster workflows. Segments.ai helps machine learning teams and engineers label their data at scale (without worrying about quality).
Upload point clouds of unlimited size[Tom Staelens](https://segments.ai/<https:/segments.ai/blog/author/tomatillos/> "Posts by Tom Staelens")2023-11-06T10:47:45+01:00
### [Upload point clouds of unlimited size](https://segments.ai/<#collapse-1-2064>)
Segments.ai can handle all the data you have. Our 3D Point Cloud interface splits point clouds into 3D tiles for faster loading times and a reduced GPU workload (similar to Google Map‚Äôs use of low to high-resolution images). And, the backend technology makes sure the UX stays fast and responsive.
Label dynamic objects with Batch Mode[Tom Staelens](https://segments.ai/<https:/segments.ai/blog/author/tomatillos/> "Posts by Tom Staelens")2023-11-06T10:53:15+01:00
### [Label dynamic objects with Batch Mode](https://segments.ai/<#collapse-1-2070>)
Batch Mode lets you view all instances of an object in a sequence on a single, scrollable screen. Correcting labels is as easy as modifying the cuboid in one row, then watching the changes be applied in all other frames.
Label stationary objects with Merged Point Cloud[Tom Staelens](https://segments.ai/<https:/segments.ai/blog/author/tomatillos/> "Posts by Tom Staelens")2023-11-06T10:53:21+01:00
### [Label stationary objects with Merged Point Cloud](https://segments.ai/<#collapse-1-2072>)
Make it easy to label stationary objects that only have a few points in each frame. Merged Point Cloud mode combines all the frames in a sequence into one large point cloud. By consolidating the points across frames, object outlines become more visible ‚Äî allowing for precise annotation with a tight-fitting cuboid in a single go.
Propagate cuboids across sequences with machine learning[Tom Staelens](https://segments.ai/<https:/segments.ai/blog/author/tomatillos/> "Posts by Tom Staelens")2023-11-06T10:53:28+01:00
### [Propagate cuboids across sequences with machine learning](https://segments.ai/<#collapse-1-2074>)
Speed up the process of 3D bounding box labeling with keyframe interpolation in the Batch Mode interface. On the Scale and Enterprise plans, you can also take advantage of the automated tracking feature.
Automated cuboid propagation lets you label a moving object once, then automatically track it across frames by hitting the ‚Äúplay‚Äù button. If you notice any deviations from the path, simply hit pause, make the necessary corrections, and then continue again.

## Auto-label and verify 2D images & sequences
Label and correct objects and regions quickly and accurately. Machine learning labeling models are here to help annotate objects with segmentation, bounding boxes, polygons, polylines, and keypoints.
  * ### [Superpixel 2.0](https://segments.ai/<#tab-66eb7e7af2a08fbcc0f>)
  * ### [Autosegment](https://segments.ai/<#tab-c1ba1148e1bc187f046>)
  * ### [Hover-and-click](https://segments.ai/<#tab-f86d0ee6756598daa26>)
  * ### [Pre-labels](https://segments.ai/<#tab-87b19e6394dbcf08415>)


  * ### [Superpixel 2.0](https://segments.ai/<#tab-66eb7e7af2a08fbcc0f>)


With superpixels, your image is instantly divided into coherent regions. You can easily change the granularity of the superpixels by scrolling with your mouse, giving you precise control over the level of detail in your segmentation. Simply click on a superpixel to label the corresponding region.
Superpixel 2.0 goes beyond the color of nearby pixels. It also uses machine learning-assisted models ‚Äì perfected for autonomous driving and robotics use cases ‚Äì to recognize shapes. That means faster and more accurate segmentation of images, plus improved quality of labels.
  * Create segmentation masks for complete images in a single click
  * Scroll to change the granularity of the superpixels
  * Add or detract fractions of an object with ease


[More ML-assisted labeling tools](https://segments.ai/<https:/segments.ai/data-labeling/2d-image-annotation/>)

  * ### [Autosegment](https://segments.ai/<#tab-c1ba1148e1bc187f046>)


Segment small objects and high-resolution images with the Autosegment tool. Just draw a box around the object you want to label, and it will automatically generate a segmentation mask for the foreground element in the box.
  * Accurate fitting labels in seconds
  * Ideal for fine and small objects
  * For segmenting high-resolution images


[More ML-assisted labeling tools](https://segments.ai/<https:/segments.ai/data-labeling/2d-image-annotation/>)

  * ### [Hover-and-click](https://segments.ai/<#tab-f86d0ee6756598daa26>)


Built upon an expansive dataset of over 11 million images, the integrated Segment Anything Model lets you segment in a single click. Just hover your mouse over an object to see the suggested segmentation masks, then lock them in with the push of a button. 
  * Save hours compared to manually labeling generic images
  * Highly accurate labeling for everyday objects, thanks to a huge dataset
  * Simplify the process with an easy-to-use tool

## Label 3D point clouds efficiently
Annotate objects in 3D in just a few clicks. You can upload point clouds of unlimited size, then label them with smart interfaces and tools such as the merged 3D mode, the batch mode, and automated tracking.
The best part? You can use that 3D data to enrich your 2D labeling efforts. Instead of drawing hundreds of bounding boxes, all you need is a single cuboid in a 3D point cloud. Then, you can project that cuboid to all the images where the object appears and voil√† ‚Äî you‚Äôve just saved your team precious time and effort.

Segments.ai can handle all the data you have. Our 3D Point Cloud interface splits point clouds into 3D tiles for faster loading times and a reduced GPU workload (similar to Google Map‚Äôs use of low to high-resolution images). And, the backend technology makes sure the UX stays fast and responsive.

Batch Mode lets you view all instances of an object in a sequence on a single, scrollable screen. Correcting labels is as easy as modifying the cuboid in one row, then watching the changes be applied in all other frames.

Make it easy to label stationary objects that only have a few points in each frame. Merged Point Cloud mode combines all the frames in a sequence into one large point cloud. Speed up the process of 3D bounding box labeling with keyframe interpolation in the Batch Mode interface. On the Scale and Enterprise plans, you can also take advantage of the automated tracking feature.
Automated cuboid propagation lets you label a moving object once, then automatically track it across frames by hitting the ‚Äúplay‚Äù button. If you notice any deviations from the path, simply hit pause, make the necessary corrections, and then continue again.

  * ### Superpixel 2.0‚ü®53‚ü©


With superpixels, your image is instantly divided into coherent regions. You can easily change the granularity of the superpixels by scrolling with your mouse, giving you precise control over the level of detail in your segmentation. Simply click on a superpixel to label the corresponding region.
Superpixel 2.0 goes beyond the color of nearby pixels. It also uses machine learning-assisted models ‚Äì perfected for autonomous driving and robotics use cases ‚Äì to recognize shapes. That means faster and more accurate segmentation of images, plus improved quality of labels.
  * Create segmentation masks for complete images in a single click
  * Scroll to change the granularity of the superpixels
  * Add or detract fractions of an object with ease

generated_description:
**Segments.ai: Building Better Datasets for Computer Vision**

Segments.ai is a fast-growing, remote-first startup based in Brussels, Belgium, founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's W21 batch. With a lean team of eight, their mission is straightforward: to build better computer vision models by creating better datasets. This is particularly crucial in fields like robotics and automotive, where accurate data labeling is pivotal for AI training and validation.

### What They Do
Segments.ai specializes in multi-sensor data labeling, facilitating efficient annotation of point cloud and image data. This capability is essential for companies that are developing advanced technologies such as autonomous drones, delivery robots, and self-driving cars. Their platform allows users to annotate 3D and 2D data concurrently, which enhances workflow speed and ensures the consistency of the labeled data.

### Products and Services
The platform supports various data labeling tasks, including:
- **Multi-Sensor Labeling:** Users can label images and point clouds in a unified interface, improving annotation speed and accuracy.
- **3D Point Cloud Labeling:** This feature supports complex object segmentation, cuboid annotations, and keypoints.
- **2D Labeling:** For traditional image processing tasks, it includes bounding boxes, polygons, and keypoints.

They also integrate machine learning tools to assist with labeling, such as automated tracking and real-time interpolation for dynamic objects. This automation can significantly reduce the manual effort required, allowing teams to focus on higher-value tasks.

### Target Industries
Segments.ai serves a diverse array of sectors, including:
- Autonomous vehicles and Advanced Driver-Assistance Systems (ADAS)
- Off-road robotics
- Delivery robotics
- Autonomous public transportation
- Maritime robotics

### Team and Partners
The team at Segments.ai is backed by notable figures in the tech industry, including Harj Taggar as a Group Partner from Y Combinator. With a robust financial runway and a clear strategy, they're poised for further growth.

### Why It Matters
In the era of AI, data quality is paramount. Segments.ai recognizes that to drive advancements in autonomous technology, high-quality, well-labeled datasets are essential. Their innovative approach not only accelerates the development of AI-driven applications but also sets a new standard for the data labeling industry.

Segments.ai is a compelling choice for organizations looking to streamline their annotation processes and enhance the reliability of their AI models. They're not just building datasets; they're building the future of machine learning in complex environments.

For more information or to start a free trial, you can visit their website at [Segments.ai](https://segments.ai).
